title: Duo partner, Bronze to gold bb. Low Silver to high bronze skill pref
body: Hey, I'm getting back into Lol, looking for someone to duo on Skype or curse with. Playing for fun but would like to win!! :) add the '' Dramalessllama ''{{champion:53}}

replies.body: Yeah me too. Add me in game and we can go for gold :D
I am keen. Add me in game, I would like to play with you before we duo however.
